service_details.title: What do we offer in Bare Metal Provisioning Consulting Services?
service_details.subtitle: Leverage our bare metal provisioning expertise for a smooth adoption & implementation:

sections.title: On‑premise Hardware to MaaS Guidance
sections.description: Whether you’re looking to harness bare metal provisioned hardware for internal teams or external projects, it’s crucial to ensure seamless hardware provisioning. This guarantees that your platform engineers and developers can capitalize on its full potential.
offerings: Expert assessment: Our bare metal specialists delve deep to evaluate your existing hardware environment and needs.

Collaborative analysis: During our evaluation, we partner with your architects and IT teams. This collaboration enables us to grasp the nuances of your infrastructure provisioning. From this understanding, we devise a tailored architecture and provide guidelines for automating your bare metal provisioning using API‑centric approaches.

Pain point resolution: We identify challenges in your process, suggesting actionable solutions. Based on these insights, we design a strategic roadmap featuring recommended tools. Rest assured, we take full responsibility for delivering on this roadmap in alignment with our mutual understanding.

sections.title: Customized OS Building and Verification
sections.description: If you feel Vanilla OS images are not sufficient for you and need a custom‑built OS image which is secure to use and provision across diverse architectures, our experts can offer:
offerings: Holistic solutions: Our team delves into your specific needs, suggesting a solution tailored to your needs to build custom OS, inclusive of essential packages and artifacts.
Reproducible builds: We would recommend Continuous Integration pipeline, guaranteeing reproducible builds for custom OS. CI also ensures verification with best security practices.
Cross‑vendor support: Catering to a multitude of hardware vendors and architectures, we ensure seamless distribution of your bespoke OS images across the data‑center.

sections.title: Tinkerbell Enterprise Support
sections.description: Tinkerbell is one of the most popular frameworks for bare metal provisioning. InfraCloud team played major roles in contributing and open sourcing Tinkerbell.
offerings: Tinkerbell adoption: If you are interested in adopting Tinkerbell, or need help in adoption, we can help you.
Existing user: If you are already using Tinkerbell and looking for enterprise support, our Tinkerbell experts would be happy to help you.
Software solutions with Tinkerbell: If you are implementing a software solution with Tinkerbell for bare metal provisioning, our development team can accelerate your journey.

sections.title: On‑prem Kubernetes Provisioning
sections.description: As organizations need to follow regulatory compliance and need better data security and control, they often look to have their own on‑prem datacenter. On‑prem comes with the benefits of performance and the ability of customization to specific requirements.
offerings: Our team would work on understanding your needs and recommend solution to provision Kubernetes across your datacenter adhering to best practices.
We would configure right access controls across different tenants, ensuring infrastructure and applications are resilient with backup/DR capabilities.
